articles.title: Argentina's farmers notch sales of more than 70% of soybean crop
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Nov 8 (Reuters) - Argentine farmers sold as of last week about 72% of the current soybean harvest, government data showed on Tuesday, a key crop especially important since it helps generate much-needed hard currency for the country's cash-strapped government.During the same time last season, farmers sold a little over 73% of the soybean harvest.Argentina's

articles.title: Argentina's reserves under pressure again after soy export bonanza ends
articles.description: By Jorge OtaolaBUENOS AIRES, Nov 8 (Reuters) - The Argentine central bank's already depleted reserves are coming under renewed pressure, as grains exports from the South American nation have stalled following a soybean sales bonanza and a drought that is hitting wheat and corn.The country's central bank sold some $150 million on Monday, the largest daily fall in reserves since

articles.title: Lionel Messi’s Argentina predicted to win in simulation
articles.description: Lionel Messi and his Argentina side have been tipped to win the Qatar World Cup by EA Sports
articles.content:
The 2022 World Cup will be Lionel Messi‘s last for Argentina.
Messi has represented the South American nation at every tournament since 2006, his best finish coming in 2014 when the team lost 1-0 to Germany in the final.

articles.title: Argentina, Lionel Messi predicted to win big at World Cup
articles.description: EA Sports have declared Argentina as 2022 World Cup winners using a simulation on FIFA 23, and they have a great track record of predicting winners.

articles.title: Ancajas’ redemption tour begins in February
articles.description: Jerwin Ancajas, whose six-year reign as IBF super-flyweight champion ended with back-to-back losses to Fernando Martinez of Argentina this year, will launch his redemption tour at bantamweight in February.

articles.title: England let focus drift to World Cup in shock Argentina loss, admits Eddie Jones
articles.description: Eddie Jones has admitted England let their focus drift to the 2023 World Cup before Sunday’s shock loss to Argentina at Twickenham.
articles.content:

articles.title: Wild scenes as 10 red cards handed out in Argentinian Champions Trophy between Racing Club and Boca Juniors
articles.description: There was no love lost in the final of the Champions Trophy in Argentina with 10 red cards shown by the referee in Racing Club's 2-1 win over Boca Juniors. WATCH IT HERE
articles.content:
